for _ in range(int(input())):
    input_data = list(map(int, input().split(' ')))
    num_cups = input_data[0]
    posin = input_data[1]
    num_flip = input_data[2]
    for item in range(num_flip):
        (left, right) = map(int, input().split(' '))
        if left <= posin <= right:
            dif = posin - left
            posin = right - dif
    print(posin)

a = int(input(''))
for i in range(a):
    (n, c, q) = [int(x) for x in input('').split()]
    l = [0] * n
    l[c - 1] = 1
    for j in range(q):
        (x, y) = [int(x) for x in input('').split()]
        if x <= c and c <= y:
            l[c - 1] = 0
            c = y - c + x
            l[c - 1] = 1
    print(l.index(1) + 1)

t = int(input())
while t != 0:
    (n, c, q) = map(int, input().split())
    while q != 0:
        (l, r) = map(int, input().split())
        if c >= l and c <= r:
            x = c - l + 1
            c = r - x + 1
        q -= 1
    print(c)
    t -= 1

from sys import stdin, stdout
t = int(stdin.readline().rstrip())
while t > 0:
    (n, c, q) = map(int, stdin.readline().rstrip().split())
    v = c
    while q > 0:
        (a, b) = map(int, stdin.readline().rstrip().split())
        if a <= v <= b:
            v = a + b - v
        q -= 1
    print(v)
    t -= 1

from sys import stdin, stdout
t = int(stdin.readline().rstrip())
while t > 0:
    (n, c, q) = map(int, stdin.readline().rstrip().split())
    p = c - 1
    while q > 0:
        (a, b) = map(int, stdin.readline().rstrip().split())
        if a - 1 <= p <= b - 1:
            p = a + b - (p + 2)
        q -= 1
    print(p + 1)
    t -= 1

from sys import stdin, stdout
t = int(stdin.readline().rstrip())
while t > 0:
    (n, c, q) = map(int, stdin.readline().rstrip().split())
    lst = [0] * n
    lst[c - 1] = 1
    p = c - 1
    while q > 0:
        (a, b) = map(int, stdin.readline().rstrip().split())
        if a - 1 <= p <= b - 1:
            (lst[p], lst[b - p - 1 + a - 1]) = (lst[b - p - 1 + a - 1], lst[p])
            p = b - p - 1 + a - 1
        q -= 1
    print(p + 1)
    t -= 1

from sys import stdin

def main():
    T = int(stdin.readline().strip())
    for _ in range(T):
        (N, C, Q) = map(int, stdin.readline().strip().split())
        C -= 1
        for loop in range(Q):
            (first, last) = map(int, stdin.readline().strip().split())
            first -= 1
            last -= 1
            if first <= C <= last:
                diff = C - first
                C = last - diff
        print(C + 1)
main()

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    numbers = list(map(int, input().split()))
    n = numbers[0]
    c = numbers[1]
    s = numbers[2]
    i = 0
    while s > 0:
        numbers = list(map(int, input().split()))
        l = numbers[0]
        r = numbers[1]
        if c >= l and c <= r:
            temp = c - l
            c = r - temp
        s = s - 1
    print(c)
    t = t - 1
